page.title: 12MEDIA 2
page.content: Nearly everyone has a cassette recorder.These are machines from which the sound is taken off a tape less than 1cm wide.{Cassette}means little box.They are used mainly to listen to or record music,but now they are very good for use with{home computers.}Most of the games which are used to program the machine.Home computers are becoming very popular.Children like them because they can play many good games like{Blagger,Chuckie_Egg}and { {Monsters.Video recorders}are good because we can see any film we want to,in our own house.We can also record T.V. programmes too,so we do not miss anything.It is easy to load the tape and watch it when you want to.
